Reviews.Title: What happened?
Reviews.Author: Big Dave
Reviews.Content: Been using this app for a few months. It worked so great that when the offer to upgrade to the pro version for free came up,why wouldn't I jump at it? Don't guy & girls!!!! As soon as the pro installed,everything went to hell! Can't get anything but a blank screen where the channel list should be. App has gone nuts! Wants to force close constantly. Only channel is BBC. Tried uninstalling & reinstalling many times - no help. Please guys,fix the bugs!!!! I love this app & when it was working,I'd recommend it to everyone. Nothing like it available anywhere. My father always told me "Don't fix it if it ain't broke" Guys,just set the app download back to the original that worked! It was the best thing since sliced bread until you tried to fix it! It wasn't broke guys. Don't shoot yourself in the foot,make it work again! Your most devoted user,Dave.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: Keenster
Reviews.Content: Surprisingly stable app with numerous channels to chose from. As noted in other reviews some of the channels do not work, but that is normal for any platform that consolidates so many stations in one place. This is also because stream addresses tend to change over time and sometimes are not accessible due to geoblocking.Would like to see a few more foreign news stations in English.Five stars for providing such a good service for free - thanks for your efforts and keep up the good work!!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: works great..... this seems to do well on my kindle fire. some shows were a little fuzzy but over all it good.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: acriticalcritter
Reviews.Content: Good stuff, especially when travelling - good value. Easy to use and works for a fair number of channels. Deserves a recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Great App
Reviews.Author: Aladdin
Reviews.Content: Amazingly good app. Many choices of stations to view and the sound and clarity is pretty good with WiFi use.

Reviews.Title: good app for watching tv on kindle hd
Reviews.Author: j. parker
Reviews.Content: I use this app quite a bit  before bed when I don't wanna watch what my husband is.  Great app, has a lot of channels and several movie channels I don't  have with mu U Verse.  Definitely recommend esp since i travel a bit and never care too much for the stations in the hotel.  Start up is good and very little problems w-buffering. ,,

Reviews.Author: housweet
Reviews.Content: For a free site this App is ok. Not much info on how to maneuver it though. I keep putting it on one channel and when I go back to it it's switched to another. Maybe in the future they could have a help tab.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: vincent meehan
Reviews.Content: the best app in the world it has all my favorite channels and this is the only Tv app that works I truely love it. please do not remove this app its the best app in the world it has mostely every channel even disney I heart American tv

Reviews.Title: I'll be darned...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It works wayyyy better than I thought it would and they actually have American channels that I want to watch!

Reviews.Title: HBO, Showtime, Many Free Cable Channels
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: I have been perusing the apps store here at Amazon since getting my Kindle Fire a few weeks back.  I stumbled on this one, read many reviews, and decided to try it.  Wow. It's truly amazing.  Channel guide is clear but I have a few complaints.  First, no blocking the ads as far as I can see, and what's up with the subtitles in other languages?  I see no way on the settings menu to change the captions/subtitles option, so on some channels like HBO and a few others, I get subtitles in Spanish and other languages, with no way to stop the subtitles from appearing that I can see.  Weird.  Another weird thing is that some channels are running "live" on my Kindle, but many are not.  I thought it would be great if I was really tired, to go to bed and watch something I wanted to finish watching, but do it in bed while about to go to sleep.  But if it's not a streaming live connection to the channel, I don't see a way to do that.  But overall, this is really an amazing app to have.  I clicked onto HBO and to my happy surprise, there was Girl With The Dragon Tattoo playing. Maybe I'll get caught up on Homeland Season 2 if Showtime runs it as a marathon or something.  Hey...this thing is free, so take advantage if you can.  I have not seen a problem with buffering the way others have, btw.

Reviews.Title: Average... just. Could be better.
Reviews.Author: TOLEDO BLAND, OR NOT?
Reviews.Content: Love the idea of this app. It's just like USTV Now, but for devices, and without the fee.There are some pluses and minuses. Let's start at the pluses.Pluses: - Get a few cable channels, no cost. - See what's happening in Tamps, Miami, Austin and Harrisburg, with their local TV network channels in those DMA's (ABC, NBC, CBS, CW and FOX). Locations as of 3/06/13, which could change. - Channels don't usually drop out, like on digital broadcast TV... and may include networks not in your own DMA (TV area) - Usable in most public WiFi placesMinuses: - No local stations unless you are in the above listed places. - Low quality picture. below 480i. Low definition pictures. Cannot read fine print in commercial spots. - Most channels are offline ALL OF THE TIME. These channels are still listed in the channel menu. - Channels are not listed in any logical order. Note that all of the local TV networks are on the bottom. - Notes of channels fixed does not mean they will work. - Prompt for upgrade doesn't explain an upgrade payment. For example, whom takes the payment via credit card, if one time or multi-pay (monthly/yearly), and where the company that operates this app's location, to research prior to app upgrade. Aka, shady area that may inhibit upgrades. You will be prompted about 2 minutes after changing channels. I do advise you check into the "Upgrade" a time or two to see what I mean. - a few double listings of channels.Some channels are not specified as to a language. For example, Nickelodeon is English on feed 1 and Nick Jr. in Spanish on feed 2. For those who love Nick @ Nite... take note of this... when it's actually on. - On some channels... LOTS of buffering. - Lots of channels listed that no longer work. - On CBS, Fox News, TBS, and a few other channels... the audio drifts off 30 seconds or more. Some audio is not i synch, as it should be. I have emailed this issues a few times now... without "support" response. - As listed above, no support reply on emailed issues. They could let one know they are working on the issue. Bad sign from the get  go. How they act for the free version shows how they will act for the paid upgrade, since you are "auditioning" the product and customer support. You will be prompted to upgrade 2 minutes after watching a new channel. - Product now has a new scroll (with lots of misspellings) on their other apps, when you change to a new channel. You see this in lime green font, scrolling on the top.Overall, It has allot to get better. I admit that I am using the free product, so the paid version MIGHT (but not confirmed) be better. I do wonder why they do not have the upgraded app here or on Google Play. That also looks fishy. Their site doesn't show it either.It is a wonderful idea... just needs some improvements and explanations. With these, I would be more than happy to use the product, if not upgrade. As the product is now, I can barely watch it. Expectations were not met on this one... at least not yet.------------------------------------------------------------------3/29/13 UPDATE: There were enhancements to the program, which include post-proccessing (good), got rid of the misspellings in the scroll - which is no longer present, brightness, etc. All good changes. However, now some of the  stations are all jumpy. Take SFL CW Miami (Channel 39.1), abc in Tampa (local Channel 28.1).... and a few channels will jump about and be twitchy. This is all the time on those channels. It's also not on all of them. Some channels are clean and not jumpy. Still at least 3/4 or more of those stations that are listed are offline. This needs to be remedied! Still audio/video synch drifting on some (listed above) and stations that are noted as fixed, are not fixed. Also, favorites are lost when you close the program/app. However, it now shows favorites, where it didn't before. Slight improvement... but still a ways to go. One note is that they removed a channel (Bloomberg) due to cease and desist order, by the channel.4/07/13 update:  Channels are off-center. This app maker appears to not check their work. The video is supposed to be "center cut" to 4x3. However, that center cut cuts off 1/3 of the picture on the right side. With this in mind, phone numbers get cut off. For example, "local 10 news alert" was displayed, but it said "Local 10 newsal" minus the "ert" The pictures are also still jerky... and quite a few channels are buffering every few seconds. These issues do not depend on post processing, hardware acceleration, etc. They all happened with all of those settings changed.Clearly, this is not run by professional engineers/programmers.

Reviews.Title: Great Application
Reviews.Author: Carlos Vasquez
Reviews.Content: Overall it's a great app with plenty of available channels. The f a critical that you get HBO, CINEMAX, and SHOWTIME for free is amazing. Many other channels available too. This is one of the best apps out there. Download and rate. That's the least we can do after enjoying this app continuously for free...

Powering off and restarting the Fire fixed it - hopefully this tiw will help anyone having the same problem.

Sometimes, when you try to watch a channel, you receive a message explaining that the channel you selected is currently offline.  USTV Free crashes a little bit, but other than that, this is a quality app for a great value.

Reviews.Title: 5 star

I have deleted this useless application.

I strongly warn other users to avoid this publishers, and be very suspicious of positive reviewers of this developer's apps.

Reviews.Author: rm
Reviews.Content: it don't have enough channels on there. it is always updating so the channels that is on there you can't watch. this is a bad app to have. Don't get me wrong I still have the app hoping that they will fix the problem and add better stations. It hasn't. It ask you want station they want you to add and I ask them to add the WE CHANNEL,BET CHANNEL,and they still have not added them but they added a lot of news channel and christian channels. I have nothing against those channels but really how many do you need! I will change my rateing once they fix it until then I can't even use it this is why i hate it!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't have a clear look.
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Whenever you are watching a channel it is always blurry and doesn't focus. I wish it would focus and get a lot clearer but it doesn't.

Reviews.Title: Too many dead channels
Reviews.Author: LONNY H SIVEY
Reviews.Content: There are too many dead channels.  And there is an add there all the time with an X on it which would lead you to believe that clicking on it will close the add.  It never closes the add, just takes you to a web page.  When you return, the video isn't playing any more but the audio is.  Only way to get the video back is to stop and restart the stream.  Of course the advertisement comes back with the tantalizing X again.  To be fair though, if you can find a channel that plays, it plays pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Limited channels; Crashes often
Reviews.Author: J. Moyer
Reviews.Content: This is an interesting app with tons of potential but it just doesn't live up to expectations. Many of the channels come up as unavailable. Some of the channels (Fox Movies) are blurry and have subtitles with no way to turn them off. The channels are undependable (May work one day or even one hour and not the next). Also, there is no listing. So you have to look up what's one the channels somewhere else. Every time I open the app, there's a message that some channels have been fixed but when I go to them, they don't work. As a result, I haven't a clue as to what the message is referring to.Another thing that bugs me is the name is US TV but there appears to be some foreign channels like BBC and some Jewish channel (I think it was Al Jezira or something like that) neither of which work.I think this could be a fantastic app if they get it to work and add a schedule. But, as it is now, I wouldn't recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great but doesn't connect all the time

Reviews.Content: Most of the time it connects, but not all the time. Other than that it is great. I love the app. Watch ESPN and Fox Sports all the time. It is Awesome. :-)

Reviews.Content: It only get  2 stars because it works but it keeps buffering and has bad picture.I would recommend not getting it unless you like sucky tv.

Reviews.Title: Alright, considering that it is free
Reviews.Author: J Taylor
Reviews.Content: Keep in mind that if I had paid more than 99¢ for this product, I would be bummed, but for free it is good.  If you download this, you can search around and find a few good channels.  I like the international news(BBC World, Al Jazeera English,, France 24), White Springs(old horror movies), and KissTV(alternopop music videos).Now you're going to have to dig through a lot of public access, religious channels and broken links to find something good, and I suggest favoriting it for easy access later. It would be nice if they had a section of channels they knew worked to save users trouble. Also, I wish there was less focus on cable channels, which are legally dubious to view and more of an attempt to have east and west coast affiliates of the major broadcast networks, minor networks(This, METV, Antena TV, RTV, etc) and broadcast networks from Canada, UK and Australia.  Also, a bit more effort in labeling would be good; there are 20 or so radio stations and nobody thought to write "pop", "rock", "country" or "R&B" in the descriptions.

Reviews.Title: use this if you want your PII leaking out from your Kindle
Reviews.Author: wti
Reviews.Content: This app uses the Revmob ad network and can harvest unique device identifiers and your e-mail address (as associated with your Kindle Fire HD, not whatever you may have told PPCLINK/US TV).Even if you think you are running any kind of "ad blocker," or have a paid version of the app, the personally identifiable information may be leaking out, anyway. This kind of spying has nothing to do with serving ads. It's about assaulting your privacy and PII.  It's the Revmob engine running inside this app that's the problem.If you didn't know this or don't accept these undisclosed functions, UNINSTALL.There are worse violators in the Amazon Appstore, but that's small consolation.Try something like Crackle or broadcast networks' own apps instead.

Reviews.Title: The future is here!
Reviews.Author: Anthony "Anthony"
Reviews.Content: This is what I've been looking for!  I'm way out in the country and my only alternatives for television are Satellite TV at $30+/month for a single SD set top box or my local "fiber to the house" Co-op whose plans start at over $100 (I'm paying $55 for just 5Mbps internet!).I'm currently on the 45 day trial but if It continues to perform the way it has so far then I will definitely start a subscription.  This is a game changer for rural folks.Watched NFL football yesterday and it looked as good to me as HD signal over Cable or Satellite.  TV reported 720p.Very excited as I have been waiting for a simple way to stream live TV over the internet for several years now.  So tired of those solutions that  pretend to offer that but what you really get are podcasts.

Reviews.Title: It's Very Good . . . but
Reviews.Author: JM - Barnstormer
Reviews.Content: The upside: There is nothing else I have found that has as many good quality channels that are available much of the time, in good resolution, and sound. For free US TV anywhere, there isn't much wrong with it.  Many thanks to the developers.The downside: When I watch it out of the country I get subtitals in what apears to be Cambodian or something similar.  Why?  I have no idea.  I am never around there.  The picture quality is good in the 7 and 10 inch screens of the Kindles we own, but I suspect it would leave much to be desired in a 55 inch TV.  And, there is a perpetual addvertisement at the bottom right hand corner.  It has an "x" in the add's right corner, but clicking it does nothing and you are stuck with it - it's annoying.  And, finally, some of the channels are not available much of the time.

Reviews.Title: great!!

Reviews.Content: Easy to use and almost too good to be true!! I'm a novice and non cable subscriber -darn economy :-) home food or cable. This app helps break the monotony on bland local tv. FREE??!!

Reviews.Title: Well...it's not TOO bad.
Reviews.Author: sleepyhead247
Reviews.Content: So a few months back, I saw US TV Free featured on a technology website hailing it as a marvel of convenience and programming availability in the modern digital age or something like that. This app could very well be those things, but overwhelmingly, too many US television streams that correspond to my interests don't work right now. It could very well at some point be amazing if only because it gives you a mobile unified experience for all the up and running channel sources. The main reason why I rate this app highly, is in hopes with higher recognition, something like US TV Free will encourage streaming content providers to find new models the viewers love to use on the go (particularly in the US). Thanks for reading!

Reviews.Title: WAS GOOD, BUT THEN--NOT SO MUCH
Reviews.Author: Speechless
Reviews.Content: I really really wanted to give this app 5 stars; however, it just worked for one good hour one day and then for five to six days, nothing would stream.  If it did, it was only for seconds at a time and then buffer, buffer, buffer.  I installed it on my android tablet approximately one month ago.  It worked off and on as I mentioned above....then....the updates came.  Oh, boy!  Then the updates began more and more often and AH-WEE, it is all over now.  When I tried to open it, I got an error message (never seen this one before) that "you must be signed in to amazon store to use this app."  Then when I clicked on the <login> option, it crashed. After trying to open it several times, restarting my tablet, trying to open it again--still same error message.  Igaveup! UNINSTALLED IT.I really hate this app stopped working.  It worked well those few times it ran.  I could get HBO, StarZ, Showtime, TBS, CW, Food Network, and a few others (if the weather was clear--LOL).  Anyway, please fix the bugs and I would even be willing to pay to use it.  There are lots of channels on the list to choose from, but none actually comes in.  Anywho, well, it's FREE, huh?UPDATE--TWO WEEKS LATER-Soon after writing this review, I uninstalled the Amazon Appstore and intalled it again!  Doing so caused me to have to sign in again, which, in turn, fixed the problem with this app. After installing it again, it works seamlessly, just as if it never happened (justified!).

Reviews.Title: ustv

Reviews.Content: Had this app a long time ago was looking for it again love it the first time .... Now that I got it again I love it even more .... get to watch all my favorite shows again when I travel and also get to keep up on football ..... I think this is a great way to watch tv ....... awsome .....

Was inundated repeatedly with ads asking viewer to buy other products unrelated to this app, demanding a response. Pointless waste of time. I'm uninstalling.

Since the second week it been very sporatic as to any channel I try to view. In this last week..no channles work except HLN which is showing movies. No news or anything else. I use a Kindle Fire and most things work except for this app. Glad it was free. Now I will delete and search for something else to use.

Reviews.Content: There are approximately 205 channels listed - of these there are probably a dozen which interest me.  The History Channel is in Spanish (although it says US) and the Discovery Channel is in Russian!!  Some of them don't connect at all.  If you are hoping for some good content, you will be disappointed in this app - waste of time and effort.  It used to have CBS, Fox and some other good ones but they were inextricably dropped

Reviews.Title: could be better! !!
Reviews.Author: Doc Montana "Scott" "Doc Craver"
Reviews.Content: Dropping to many channels & too much buffering....also when i downloaded it to my new Galaxy Tab 2 it didn't have near the channels as. My Kindle HD????

Reviews.Title: Quite disappointed
Reviews.Author: LynnAnn Thomas "mover of energy"
Reviews.Content: I was excited by the good reviews...thought this would be great...then after the download and opening...first thing get the message "These networks have been removed at the request of..." and it lists the 5 networks I downloaded the app to watch..one being NBC and another USA (can't watch so many network's shows because of the "no flash player" on Kindle Fire HD...(anyone get around that?).also...so many nit-picky local cable networks...which would be great if you lived in anyone of those unknow towns.Also also..most of the other major networks were "unavailable...try again"..sooooo I deleted it and was thankful I didn't pay for it.

Reviews.Title: unusable
Reviews.Author: Virginia Manning "Gina"
Reviews.Content: It would be a great app but it's impossible to watch anything when it buffers every 2 seconds. I wish it would actually play.

Reviews.Title: US TV
Reviews.Author: Barbara Pacific "Barbara"
Reviews.Content: Its ok I can watch TV sometimes but with all the buffering I miss quite a bit of the show I'm watching

Reviews.Title: US TV Free is a waste of time
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: This is a very disappointing app.  It does not live up to the advertising.  Favorite channels (e.g., USA, NBC, etc.,) are being dropped from this app almost every time I try to use it or channels are "offline" (TNT, CNN).  Also, I've tried searching for specific shows and have not been successful either.  I will be deleting this app.  There's got to be a better one out there -- I just wanted to catch a couple specific shows that I'd missed.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Mary Nally "MARY NALLY"
Reviews.Content: i am giving three stars only because i watched it forever and it was great but now it deserves only 1 star.  now every time i get into a channel it goes away, or it is in another language, not much left for me to watch. bring back nbc and cbs and i might keep watching, until then i must look for something new, bummer i liked this app

Reviews.Title: Beware
Reviews.Author: M. Stephan "mts777"
Reviews.Content: When I installed this app, webroot blocked it and said it was unsafe. Definitely not worth the risk. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Odale
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised. The app is easy to use and it streams very well and in good quality as well. The more I use my kindle the more I realise I need nothing else around the house lol. I would recommend this app to anyone

Reviews.Title: Good free app!!!
Reviews.Author: Juanita
Reviews.Content: I downloaded this. app today and already I really like !!  Some channels don't work but most of the ones I like do.  So thanks! !!

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just installed this app on my Galaxy 7 Plus and so far I am very impressed. Just now tried the Cartoon Network and it's working great and kids would love it. Syfy is showing Star Trek perfectly right now, StarZ is working great, HBO has 3 sources to choose from, 1 & 3 didn't work, but source 2 is working, but buffering now and then, maybe the time of day. Fox Movies is showing Spiderman 1 from 2002 now and not buffering. There are about 51 channels on the Hot Channel list, and way too many to count on the All Channel list. You can also choose by category, and there is a Favorite list too. So far, all channels I try work. Yes, I am very impressed.

Reviews.Title: Works Great on Kindle HD
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I love it.  I was at a coffee shop the other day watching PGA Golf live.  If you have a Kindle HD this is a must have app.

Reviews.Title: puzzled
Reviews.Author: Scotty B "scotty"
Reviews.Content: I've had this app for a long time now... and it works AWESOME.....but here's the thing today I got an alert from my lookout app that it is adware/malware what's the deal?

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: E. Roach "Ellie"
Reviews.Content: I read others reviews, some positive, some negative.  I can only say that I love it and haven't had any problems.  People complain that they can't receive some of the channels that they want, I say "WOW" look at all of the free channels I CAN receive.  There will always be complainers, but I'm definitely not one of them...  Can't wait for more free time, have a movie I want to see!

Reviews.Title: Cool but a few problems.
Reviews.Author: Cameron Adkins
Reviews.Content: I like this app its very cool but around a little later after I got it it wouldn't play any major channels like FOX and stuff like that but you can (as long as you have internet connection) you can watch channels that you don't have but they don't have local channels (unless you live in an international city) or the weather channel. Have fun with this app.

Reviews.Title: GREAT IF YOU WANT CNN ONLY
Reviews.Author: Qrysta White "qrysta"
Reviews.Content: This is actually the only app I've used on Kindle Fire that gives me any channel exactly as it appears on one's existing television.  So big plus for that.  Most of the time I can get CNN buffering free.Buts that's about all thet's truly live and comfortably viewable.MSNBC gave a broadcast an hour plus old with news that was about 6 hours old so the word LIVE is usually rather loosely in the channel list.Pic qual is enhanced with one of the settings but most settings I have no clue what they do.Visualization?Record, does absolutely nothing.Channels are in no particular order in the list screenPause doesn't pause but ends your station connection.The LANGUAGE a station will arrive in is anyone's guess.  Subtitles in Mandarin anyone?Many stations give you audio but nothing but solid black as the imageAnd when you can see a show there is no title line telling you what you are looking at so unless its NEWS or you recognize the sitcom you're lost.Forget about searching for a show by title.The UPGRADE to Pro, does what exactly?  The app doesn't give you a little paragraph telling you what for.As I stated at the outset for CNN I love it.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: jojo
Reviews.Content: It works really good some stations don't work but they have live tv and movie stations I suggest you get it works really good they also fix the stations

Reviews.Title: It's okay....
Reviews.Author: PA Mom of 2
Reviews.Content: Searching is horrible, I spend more time trying to find a channel than I actually do watching it and if you hit the wrong button, back to search through them all over again....pages and pages and pages of scrolling to find it...  Most channels did work though, of the few I tried.  Honestly though, I pretty much gave up on it after a few tries due to the monotonous searching.

Reviews.Title: great app
Reviews.Author: HeavenBeam "HeavenBeam"
Reviews.Content: pretty good app. easy to use and great content.  haven't figured out how to get show info yet but probably easy

Reviews.Title: US tv free
Reviews.Author: Israel Montoya
Reviews.Content: Very good app and the best part it's free, they fix the channels quick, there is also a good selection of channels. I have already recommend it to some family members.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Lexey
Reviews.Content: A while back my satellite went out and with this app I was able to watch most of my favorite shows until it was repaired.  It has a variety of channels, some of which I would never watch, but several that I do.  I would definately recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Terrific!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I don't have the tv to myself whete I am right now so this app is just great! I just wish it could get more BBC programing. But it's really good as it is. But I would like to know how to upgrade to the PRO version.

Reviews.Title: Decent channel selection
Reviews.Author: Kddiva
Reviews.Content: App has a lot of public access channels, but a few of big networks as well. Some buffering issues. A decent substitute for live TV.

Reviews.Title: unreliable/improved
Reviews.Author: Chadwick E. Labno
Reviews.Content: upgraded but same unreliable app as free version, don't waste your moneyunless you want to watch 'buffering' on your android device.edited to add additional infodon't know why but possible the upgrade took affect. yesterday watched Fox for hours without a 'buffering' message. app well worth the purchase price.hope things stay the same or improve but don't,t know how it could get better

Reviews.Title: It works...but.....
Reviews.Author: The G
Reviews.Content: This App works however I'm very skeptical about the potential problems with copyrights and the legality of this app.  You must agree that US TV FREE is not responsible for anything and to basically watch at your own risk.  The quality of the channels were not that good.  It looked like someone was using a video camera to record the shows.  I've deleted this app off of my kindle.

Reviews.Title: Not bad, but not good
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: This app is interesting and so far the best TV app I can find.  That doesn't mean it's the greatest.  It only works a little less than 50% of the time but it's better than some others I've tried.  A lot of the channels simply don't work.  There are a lot of buffering problems.  Sometimes picture quality isn't great.  It appears that if an owner of the station complains, the developer will remove the channel.  Overall, I wouldn't depend on this app to watch a lot of TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice app. But could stand to add more English speaking channels.
Reviews.Author: Neo Blackwood
Reviews.Content: Has many popular channels, but only one issue, many of them are streamed in various other non-English languages. There are a few that are streamed in English, which is nice, but would be great to have a complete list in English. Perhaps a language streaming option. Otherwise this app is excellent, lots of potential.

Reviews.Title: BigDaddy
Reviews.Author: ANTONIO GARCIA "Antonio Garcia"
Reviews.Content: Love this app, no need for cable. Internet alone works with my kindle fire.this is a great purchase for your . Kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: hmmmm??!!!
Reviews.Author: kymelle
Reviews.Content: It would be a good app when it works. However, too many times I'd be totally engrossed in a show, then suddenly mid program it would go off-line. Extremely frustrating and nerve wrecking. What's the point??

Reviews.Title: Was great..........
Reviews.Author: Carlos Rosario
Reviews.Content: Before I loved it, but now it doesn't work. I will change this revise if it works again. I am very dissapointed it how it turned out

Reviews.Title: USA TV
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: It's amanzing it even works we're ever we you go !  I love this app it like it change my life.  I told my firends and they even like it to.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: c.c.
Reviews.Content: what a cool app I was very surprised at the quility and selection of channels that this app provides. if you want to watch your shows on the go or at work or in the car this is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Few Programs Available
Reviews.Author: M. Norton "rickmare53"
Reviews.Content: This App isn't worth the effort as there are very few programs available and then mostly foreign (despite the fact the App is called "US TV").

Reviews.Title: Great app
Reviews.Author: D. Berdanis "endymion9"
Reviews.Content: Only problem I had was it wouldn't show in the cloud for my Kindle Fire HD.  Downloaded it on my Kindle Fire and it worked great there, but couldn't put it on my Fire HD.  Went to the amazon page using my PC and tried rebuying it (for free) and that time it finally appeared in the cloud for my FIre HD to download.Love this app.  Great idea.

Reviews.Title: cant get it to work
Reviews.Author: TVgram
Reviews.Content: No instructions. Could'nt load Flash Player on my Kindle Fire. Uninstalled after multiple searches and  attempts. Very disappointed as I like to watch TV from mulitiple channels. I feel it is the fault of the app not Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Just Great for the Kindle Fire HD!
Reviews.Author: Rich C. "Rich"
Reviews.Content: Of the channels they list/make available, it works Great!  If the first source is not very good, you can changeto a 2nd, 3rd, 4th source listed.  Normally they have movie channels, cartoons, news, sports, etc.This is Truly one of the best available "free apps" for watching tv I have used...

Reviews.Title: Great Program
Reviews.Author: Raymond G Allum
Reviews.Content: An amazing app that works as advertised! It actually plays good stations you actually want to watch! And it;s free!

Reviews.Title: Great idea - will not work for everyone
Reviews.Author: L C Thomason
Reviews.Content: Concept of viewing TV on kindle is great.  However, it will not work correctly unless user has very high speed connection.  With a normal DSL, it does not work well.  Constantly 'buffering', then freezes.

Reviews.Title: lost in space
Reviews.Author: trucker Bill "Bill"
Reviews.Content: I'm glad it's free! Plenty of great channels, even some premium like HBO but what good are they if you have no picture or constant buffering. by the way couldn't get any premium channels to even do that. If it wasn't free, I'd be fightin mad!

Reviews.Title: Fantabulous!!!!  Better than cable!
Reviews.Author: anon no muss
Reviews.Content: I am so impressed with this FREE app!  If I could give it 8 stars, I would!  Of course, you have to put forth some effort at finding the sources that are online. Which just means you might not get to watch a particular channel at that particular time.  But surf around and you'd be surprised at what you DO get to see- for free!!!  I'm tempted to drop my highly expensive cable bundle and just watch this instead.  Will most definitely be recommending this to friends.

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: Sarah Dutton
Reviews.Content: I have not really used it. It does get the channels but it is always buffering so I never really tried it for more than a few minutes.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was Looking For!
Reviews.Author: dom836
Reviews.Content: Love the app and the ability to watch TV on my Kindle Fire.  However, I would upgrade  except that I only pay thru Amazon and PayPal on the net and that is not one of the options given.  When it is, I will upgrade.  If It isn't ever an option, I'll just have to be satisfied with the free version.A few suggestionsThe names of the channels could be in alpha order.There seems to be no access to the SETTINGS area.Also a way to stop the buffering or loading when it seems to be stuck in a cycle or when the screen freezes.

Reviews.Title: Great App
Reviews.Author: TV Omaha
Reviews.Content: Better than expected. Must tell others and looking forward to exploring all the channel options. Easily satisfied with this app. Will probably upgrade.

Reviews.Title: I wold like it much better if it was in English instead of Spanish.  How do I get English???
Reviews.Author: Nancy F. Strain "NancyS"
Reviews.Content: I wold like it much better if it was in English instead of Spanish.  How do I get English??? Picture is very clear.

Reviews.Title: Good but...
Reviews.Author: MIGUEL AGUILO MARTES
Reviews.Content: It is pretty good, it would be 5 stars if I could go full screen or upgrade thru Amazon... (I don't just put my credit card info on a program just like that, PPCLINK!)

Reviews.Title: Great app
Reviews.Author: DEBORAH WHITBY
Reviews.Content: I'm impressed great app it really works.  I shared. it withmy friend she thought it was the best also.  It is awsome.)

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly Surprised
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: I've tried other TV apps only to discover most of the channels were in languages I don't speak. Thanks to US TV there are plenty of channels I can relate to with only occasional buffer issues

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: special k
Reviews.Content: This app is Preety good but it doesn't have all the chanels and the resolution is not amazing but other wise this is a vrwat app for watching t.v!!!-

Reviews.Title: great app
Reviews.Author: Lana Lawson
Reviews.Content: I'm only eight and I love this app you can watch live tv,listen to the radio,and shows. Best app ever.

Reviews.Title: Top US tv stations
Reviews.Author: R Oliver
Reviews.Content: I have downloaded many Tv apps and was very dissapointed with them. I saw this app on amazon. I read the reviews and downloaded it. I am surprised how well it works. This is the best Tv app I have used. If you love TV this is one app you must have. Almost all my favorite channels are on it. Great app.

Reviews.Title: love this app
Reviews.Author: elizabeth
Reviews.Content: happily surprised.....wasn't expecting that much but this app is excellent ....I would totally recommend this app. :D it's great kjhfrx ghbij

Reviews.Title: seems great.
Reviews.Author: craig186
Reviews.Content: just downloaded seems to work great in my fire. hbo didn't work didn't expect it to though. hope to see more channels.

Reviews.Title: Some Issues, But Good
Reviews.Author: L. Procki
Reviews.Content: The app has some problems showing any channels at tines and buffers frequently, but it is the best TV app I have seen on the kindle fire so far! if they work out the streaming issues, it would be perfect, or if they let you pick shows vs. channels.

Reviews.Title: so far so good! hoping I can enjoy it on the go! great app!
Reviews.Author: L. McDowell
Reviews.Content: So happy I stumbled upon this app. Looks great. streams well enough. looking forward to using it on the go!

Reviews.Title: fabulous
Reviews.Author: Smedley
Reviews.Content: This is the best thing to come out on android.  Love this app. I would recomend it to anyone that likes to watch show on the go.

Reviews.Title: Surprises
Reviews.Author: Sister King "Trecia DeJean"
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical at first but then saw how easy to navigate and tune in it is.  The jury is still out so far so good.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: the good thing is that it is freewhile the bad one is its quality in pictures and the quantity.

Reviews.Title: Five stars?should have 10!!!
Reviews.Author: aideenstylex333xo
Reviews.Content: It's a really good app for those people that have no cable. Obviously  it doesn't have all channels but it has disney channel,cartoon network, and some news channels too.The only catch is you must have at least 3 bars of internet. Concluding , it is a good app.

Reviews.Title: great if you are stationed overseas
Reviews.Author: G. Y. Newbill
Reviews.Content: most online features  will give a "sorry you are out of the country " error message if you happen to be stationed abroad leaving many to feel forgotten about...but this actually works (for now) even while I am in England to watch my shows and commercials like I am back at home if only for a little bit!

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected for a free app.
Reviews.Author: Lisa Cortes "LCortes"
Reviews.Content: Yes, fuzzy but still better than some other streaming sites I've used. Definitely worth downloading and easy to use too.

Reviews.Title: ok tv app
Reviews.Author: Skyking 713 "stained glass geek"
Reviews.Content: Cant beat free.  Many channels are non-english. No way to tell til you view.  But some is better than none! Surprised by the quality.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: kOztrich
Reviews.Content: Only a few statons work and/or are worth watching. Mostly many private channels such as city governments, but I did get the Discovery Channel to work.  there's better out there, also for free.  Check out TV Portal, for instance.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Terry Gunn "Terry A Gunn"
Reviews.Content: when I got this app I thought it was dumb but now it is the bomb some of the channels to not work but what there is it makes this the best app for watching Tv out there

Reviews.Title: slow
Reviews.Author: sadness
Reviews.Content: Buffers constantly, if it ran smooth it would be great, fix that and great app. Good selection of channels though, looking forward to better connection

Reviews.Title: Too Many Off Lines
Reviews.Author: Frank Kerschner
Reviews.Content: The app is ok. Most of the time you get stations that are off line, so there is no feed to your device. With all the channels presently on the app ypu will find something to watch just have to keep looking.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Blake123
Reviews.Content: was really good but kinds fuzzy got a lot of good channels and the sound was good as well great app

Reviews.Title: Good when working
Reviews.Author: Donkey's Mouth
Reviews.Content: Offers links to many tv stations that sometimes work and sometimes don't. Picture quality is not immaculate, but is good enough to see what is needed. I was using it to watch English Premier League soccer on through ESPN, but it's hit and miss with their server being able to access ESPN networks.Worth having loaded on so you can at least attempt to watch things. If it's connecting then you're golden.

Reviews.Title: confused
Reviews.Author: j.altine
Reviews.Content: at first it worked  perfectly  i got to watch tom and jerry but then  the next  day when  i tried to open it .. it kept on force closing this app has great potential but the person or people  who  designed it did a VERY POOR job

Reviews.Title: Not sure yet.
Reviews.Author: Kenneth E. Love
Reviews.Content: Still working out the kinks on this one, trying to figure out everytime i launch a channel it's not available.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Paul in St Louis
Reviews.Content: Yay! Now I can view cable news without cable. May just buy the upgrade to show appreciation for such a great app.

Reviews.Title: Not too shabby.
Reviews.Author: Travis Waldera "I don't usually say thank you...
Reviews.Content: Works really well however not all channels work but that's just the way it goes. Some channels at a bit fuzzy but my daughter doesn't mind a bit.

Reviews.Title: isnt perfect but for free no complaints
Reviews.Author: N. Roberts
Reviews.Content: awesome free access to live Tv that works fairly well. as other reviewers have said sometimes channels don't work, BUT ITS FREE!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: wont open
Reviews.Author: Norma
Reviews.Content: Cant get this to open on my Fire either in landscape or portrait mode!  So disappointing! worked for one day then stopped  PLEASEEDIT: 02/12/2013 -Changed my review from original 1 star to 3. It seems there has been an upgrade and now it opens on my KF.  There are only a few channels I look at when I remember that I have the app. It's okay, but does not replace real TV.  Good concept.  Hope it keeps improving.

Reviews.Title: Great App...Oneof my favorites so far.
Reviews.Author: Papa Didge
Reviews.Content: There are some really good channels here. I was quite impressed with the selection. Sure it is not perfect, but it is free and works fairl well.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: SandyM
Reviews.Content: Had no problem downloading this app and so far it works great! Channel selection is very good and quality was surprisingly great. Because it works and is free I give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: TN VOLS
Reviews.Content: It is a nice app!  Very source for TV shows. It has lots of choices. Works well on my Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Great app
Reviews.Author: Bman
Reviews.Content: I'm actually able to watch TV from my Kindle Fire with App...One of the better apps out there. I actually delivers what it promises.

Reviews.Title: great app
Reviews.Author: pamelia
Reviews.Content: My husband has been in hospital for 7 days now and I just found this app. and installed it on my kindle fire. Wasn't sure how it would work or if it was really free.  Took a chance and am glad I did. within a few minutes was watching t.v. while he watched football. awesome. cant get every station but still get a lot. Highly recommend this. Never know when it will come in handy. As long as there is  wi fi u r good to go.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying the channels
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: Its a hit or miss shot if you find a channel you like but each time i find something. Cant beat the free cost

Reviews.Title: watch out cable
Reviews.Author: fancye
Reviews.Content: pic very clear on kindle, on my android pic distorted went to settings turned off accelerator, pic perfect. great channels cinemax, hbo, showtime, syfy

Reviews.Title: just okay
Reviews.Author: Sleeping Beauty "Kenya"
Reviews.Content: I installed just now and I really don't like how it just plays a program already in progress and you can't stop it or search for the shows you want to be watching at the moment.

Reviews.Title: The Best!!!
Reviews.Author: CaleBale
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS APP!!! I don't have satellite so all of my favorite shows are gone. But with this, I can watch them again!!! BEST APP EVER!!! (May need high speed internet though)

Reviews.Title: Free TV
Reviews.Author: Angela S. Hall "Granny Ang"
Reviews.Content: Although you have to wade through a lot of channels that don't work there are enough that do to make it worthwhile.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Linda White "omj"
Reviews.Content: it is a good app the only thing is that if u are streaming live and watching it on the Tv it is a little late but to be a free app u cant complain

Reviews.Title: It works, but not great
Reviews.Author: Jaime Albritton
Reviews.Content: You can definitely watch tv on this, but it takes a while to connect and it doesn't connect each time if the source you chose is offline now.

Reviews.Title: IT WORKS, Free  TV, WoW!
Reviews.Author: Cristina Roskoff
Reviews.Content: I was having problems with my tablet, I couldn't even get to watch my cable service on it. Then I got this. It surprised me. This work. Its perfect. Now my little one can watch cartoons and be entertained while I am busy doing house chores.This application is easy to use and there are no surprises. I just love it!

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Ga Hin
Reviews.Content: You can watch some channels. Some are a bit blurry, but viewable. It is better, than what I had before (nothing). I haven't gone through all of the channels yet. Not much came through at midnight.

Reviews.Title: tv away from home
Reviews.Author: great app my be a link slow but it's great my...
Reviews.Content: This app is great n I love it. It's kind of slow but it's great my tv away from home

Reviews.Title: really not happy want you to upgrade all the time
Reviews.Author: John Tan
Reviews.Content: when watching. the app for a while ask forupgrade and most of the time is off line orbusy force you to change station I thinkprofit is what they want from you. so I thinkis not worth to kept this. app for long timethey station. is not bad but pure profit iswhat they want

Reviews.Title: Not too shabby
Reviews.Author: Adsawinski
Reviews.Content: Not to shabby for a free app.  Typical TV channels, depending on yo9ur internet connection will prove the quality of the viewing.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: Got this for free & am pleased with the selection of programs and the quality of picture and audio. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: good app
Reviews.Author: D. Greene
Reviews.Content: the consistant buffering is like watching YouTube on dial up, but at least it has Cartoon Network. But I would rate it higher if you could stream it faster

Reviews.Title: great app
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Works like a charm. I use it every day. It shows all the listings for my cable tv provider. good app

Reviews.Title: Awesome app!!
Reviews.Author: JamieLyn
Reviews.Content: I love this app! I have it on my Kindle Fire and my cell phone the LG Optimus Elite. My son has the same cell phone and has this app also. He loves being able to watch TV whenever he is bored. He used it just this morning while I was in a doctors appointment. He watched Disney Channel while waiting for me. I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: What a app
Reviews.Author: Reginald R Edwards ll
Reviews.Content: GREATS APP FOR KINDLE FIRE I THINK A LOT OF PEOPLE SHOULD GET BECAUSE ITS FREE AND IT GOOD AND I CAN WATCH ESPN AND DISNEY CHANNEL......

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Work! Now it Does!
Reviews.Author: Terrence L. Gray "RadMan49"
Reviews.Content: Free version worked great. Purchased the app and now it doesn't work! Now what? Contacted software manufacturer and I am waiting for a reply. Will relay their response as soon as I hear from them. Emailed these guys and all I got was a thank you for registering on their website. No help at all! App is worthless. A big waste of money. Hasnt worked for over a week. Waste of space on my Kindle. I removed it and no plans to reinstall it. Try the Amazon prime trial. It's awesome! Wish it wasn't so expensive. Wouldn't hesitate buying a year membership. Okay, I reinstalled the app several times and it works now! Very good app as long as it works. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Limited choices.
Reviews.Author: chem_prof "Bob Jones"
Reviews.Content: Too many inoperative or offline listings.  It appears that there are many channels but they are not really available.  They need to remove the offline ones.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: I love it. I recommend. this app to all kindle pps in worth it .I am real surprised with this app!  keep doing good work.

Reviews.Title: Has Many Stations, But...
Reviews.Author: Wayne Sacchi "TNPanMan"

Reviews.Title: US TV Free
Reviews.Author: Robert Carmichael
Reviews.Content: You know the old adage ,ya get what ya pay for? Well this is so true for the app presented by Amazons' US TV Free appIt is a wonderful concept however not eloquently executed. I originally found out about the app when I purchased the Minix x7Neo android mini computer to use the XBMC app on it. I ran across USTV Free and tried it. I actually liked it.The basis for the app was to give Americans traveling abroad a chance to watch live TV content from back home in the States.Watching live teliviusion after getting rid of my expensive cable was a real treat. The service was ok but at times lost signal or the channel for the website wouldn't  find not connect .atthisx point I would bed given a 6 out of10 rating, now maybe it was for,that new car smell,and eventually I would've rated differently avefter the novelty wore off ,but I was satisfied. What do you expect foir free.  A funny thing happened a month or so into having the app...... I received an alert to update the app, so I did. to my surprisewhen I updated it had Amazon assocaited with the new app. I thought ,Excellent! Its going to work even better...........Well I guess I was wrong. The channels freeze up now,  they play a live video it seems of a show but the audio may not be the one you are currently assuming you're watching. Channels are down constantly! So now its even worse than before.So that's how my rating went from 6/10 down to a 1/10

Reviews.Content: I downloaded and installed the app. When I clicked to open the screen went open and nothing happened. I tried restarting my kindle still nothing.  Don't waste your time.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad for Free APP
Reviews.Author: Jumping Jack Flash "JJF"
Reviews.Content: I was hoping to find something I could watch the news on before going to bed. This works pretty well.

Reviews.Title: disapointed
Reviews.Author: Beulah Hicks
Reviews.Content: I was able to install this and view stations available immediately but when I went to go into the program the following day it would not come up. Nothing happened but an empty screen and couldn't display any stations - just a black screen.  So I uninstalled it. Just glad it was free!

Reviews.Title: Ok, but inconsistent signal
Reviews.Author: Cam "Mcd"
Reviews.Content: This would be 5 stars if it was only for 2 things1. Better signal: I got this app primarily for NBA TV and CNN but both servers were really inconsistent and only worked about 50% of the time2. Better Stream Quality: Although the video played fast and smooth (when the channel worked) the graphics were extremely blurry.If not for these to minor issues, this wold be a 5 star app. Another feature that went for this is that HBO and Starz were both on here and worked most of the time.

Reviews.Title: What the heck!!!
Reviews.Author: pamjlipp
Reviews.Content: Read the reviews and most were good so I thought I would give it a try. All I get is an error message or a black screen. What gives?

Reviews.Title: Free Streaming TV
Reviews.Author: Mike Kelley
Reviews.Content: I was surprised that I was able to get HBO, Showtime, Food Network, TNT, Discovery Channel and many other cable channels on my Kindle Fire.  I turned on the TV and was watching the same show at the same time with just a few seconds between the feeds.  I was a little disappointed that I couldn't get CBS or NBC, I think ABC was running.  there were also a lot of local area channels that I wasn't interested in but many people may be.  Overall I was impressed.

Reviews.Title: Be careful!  May get somthing extra?
Reviews.Author: David M. Smith
Reviews.Content: When the pop-ups started refusing to go away, I got worried. The more I tried to get out, the more it fought me. I finally went into setting, LG-G2... and uninstalled it without any more problems. It looked like all the options were there, but it felt like it had been...  currupted.

Reviews.Title: Virus Detected
Reviews.Author: J L Tillett
Reviews.Content: After installing, my anti-virus app immediately warned that it was a potential threat! I uninstalled, and will not use as is.

Reviews.Title: Works o.k....
Reviews.Author: David,  Heidler
Reviews.Content: I have used it a few times since downloading it; seems to need to update quite a bit...but it does work. It's free and I do get quite a bit of content. So I am not really disappointed too much. Try it out anybody; the price is right anyway.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Allen Chheath
Reviews.Content: Awesome app! I recommend it for everyone. Use your device as a TV. This app is amazing, easy to use and very efficient.I just wish there was the AMC channel. ;P

Reviews.Title: OK

Reviews.Title: it's good in free price

Reviews.Content: This is a fairly legit tv show app but I would only recommend using this on the go when you're traveling our something but other than some of the channels being a little fuzzy but overall good quality and all but why do my other channels not have any sound

Reviews.Title: TV on Kindle
Reviews.Author: Billy Ray
Reviews.Content: Let me first say that this is freeware, so how can someone really gripe about it.I got this app because the cable company went dark and service is not their forte. Who knows when, if ever, it will come back. So, being the junky for the big screen, I went looking for instant gratification and found it with this app.You can really watch a lot of great programing for free. It's hard to believe we can watch HBO, StarZ, Showtime and others for no charge. That being said, the app is somewhat quirky and sometimes freezes the Fire HD. So what? It's a little inconvenient sometimes, but still worth it. I havn't upgraded (lol - it costs $1.99) because of a review I saw that complained that the app went really bad after the upgrade, so they just re-installed the original version. For a couple bucks I have nothing to losein upgrading.

Reviews.Title: US  TV  FREE
Reviews.Author: Dusty Debandi
Reviews.Content: Wasn't worth a flip.  Kept getting messages stating that company did not have right to access content so I could not watch ANYTHING.  It is worth it even being FREE.

Reviews.Title: Didnt work on my phone
Reviews.Author: Rickie Welch
Reviews.Content: I gave this 1 star because it would not work on my samsung galaxy phone so I deleted it.My phone is 3yrs old so it might work on newer phones.

Reviews.Title: great free app
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: free app for a kindle....works great...reception is fantastic..many channels to choose from...-many channels I can get here that I cant get on regular Tv...

Reviews.Title: Spotty at best
Reviews.Author: James Johnston
Reviews.Content: You get a little of this or that,  sometimes.  You  would have to be really desperate for tv to use this.

Reviews.Title: A good app, but in free-fall
Reviews.Author: hotfost1
Reviews.Content: USTV offered some impressive feeds for the price: HBO, Showtime, Starz, Food Network, TruTV, TNT and more... it was like signing up for cable, without the cable. Slowly, the links have steadily disappeared (though the choices still appear on the interface menu). Links defer to dead-ends that no longer play. The app is in free-fall. Menu choices like the local public-access feed to city council meetings aren't worth it unless you actually live in the city where the broadcast is relevant. Specialized, obscure channels still seem to work, but hold little interest. Get a cable box.

Reviews.Title: review of ustv app
Reviews.Author: Chow
Reviews.Content: I love it. Channels that work are awesome, even HBO. Supported the app by going Pro. Works great on my kindle fireHD.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Download
Reviews.Author: RavenQuoter
Reviews.Content: Very poor choices, and has to reboot a lot. Not worth the time to remove even. Very poor app with limited tv.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was looking for

Reviews.Content: I use this app at least 3 days of the week.  The amount of channels is limited and the video quality on some of the channels is sketchy.  It accesses movie, news, and cable channels allowing for basic entertainment.  This app is better than nothing.

All I got was a blank screen and then all of a sudden it said "RATE US"! I would give them a zero, but I had no choice. I had to rate this a 1. I'm really disappointed. I expected a great app, instead all I got was nothing. Not that surprised, nothing is really free.

Reviews.Title: US TV

Reviews.Content: I found this product to be very iffy. That's right iffy. If you have a lot of time, and your curiosity compels you to try this product, you may be disappointed. I found that half or more of the stations are from another countries web sites. Half of the time they have a lot of trouble buffering. It's just not worth the time to wait for slow buffering.

Reviews.Content: Sometimes the app fails when launched.  a lot of the stations don't seem to work you get (no connection.  You keep getting messages about upgrading to the pro version.  If the pro version works like this one, I wouldn't want to pay for it.

Reviews.Title: US TV Free - Crappy App
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: Most of the channels to select are of no interest to me. Many channels that do interest me were not available to be selected. Of the few channels to choose from that did interest me would not open up. Of the one channel that did open kept streaming so that you couldn't really watch the show; it would show a few seconds, then stream, show a few seconds, stream, etc.

Reviews.Title: Free Cable TV, including several premium channels
Reviews.Author: Linda and Charles
Reviews.Content: A really great App and I wholeheartedly recommend it.  This App provides Internet connection links to many cable TV channels including several of the premium channels.  Programs, movies, etc. all come in crystal clear.  You can watch these programs on your Kindle at the same time they are airing on TV, whether you are a subscriber to those cable programs or not.  The App gives you Premium cable and it's portable, working wherever there is a signal.  Since the volume can vary, I recommend following the App's suggestion to use headphones for better sound.

Reviews.Title: good app

Reviews.Content: Good app. Good channel lineup. Recommended to my friends. Wish there were a few more channels available to watch. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Content: Developers listen when you have issues with the app, it has all sorts of tv shows. This is a great app. I highly recommend it.

Lots of old movies and shows that I haven't seen since a little boy brings back lots of memories. All kinds of shows I had forgotten. Works great! Original B&W; Beverly Hillbilly's last night. So glad that Ellie and Granny are still doing fine! No dumb-down reality garbage or stupid commercials is worth a lot.

People forget this is a free app. I don't get some channels, and some are not available at certain times,  but I do get a lot of channels. You have to remember this is free. So in my opinion this is well worth a try.

Reviews.Title: I love this app. Finally someone makes a good internet tv app. Does pro version work good.

Reviews.Title: most channels work well

I did wind up paying the whole $4 for the pro version to remove the ads but they weren't that bad really. Just think it was worth paying $4 for as good of an app this is. If a channel you want doesn't work refresh your channel list and sometimes a new connection comes available.

Reviews.Title: Worth 3.99 Upgrade
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Latronica "DeadSpace4"
Reviews.Content: The free version works well but the ads can be annoying and I've gotten a few random ads for hook up sites or porn apps, not the best when kids are around or in more conservative company.Not every channel works all the time but they often come back if you wait a while.However, the best thing you can do is get a micro-HDMI > HDMI cable so you connect from your tablet to your TV.  With a few other apps, like HuluPlus, Netflix, and an Amazon Prime subscription you can essentially turn your tablet into the ultimate cable box... all for roughly 20 bucks a month if you choose the cheapest, "streaming only" options from the various services.I actually pay nothing because I have the log ins of various friends or family.  Catch an open WiFi channel in your building and you literally get the world for free.

Reviews.Title: WOW @ the bad reviews. I LOVE this app!
Reviews.Author: Yinzer Grrl
Reviews.Content: Wow @ the people complaining about channels not having specific features, complaining about the lack of channel guides, that channels are sometimes offline, commercials on each stations, lack of closed captioning, etc.This app is FREE.  The SHOWS are FREE.  Also, the description for this app notes, "US TV Free does not own or host any content. It simply aggregates links (which are already indexed by Google) in a convenient, user-friendly interface."I use this app on my Kindle Fire.  It's crashed maybe once or twice in the 5 or so months I've used it. I simply restart my Kindle and all is well.I've been able to watch hours of CNN, Showtime, TNT, HBO, you name it.  Minimal buffering.  Are some channels not available at certain times?  Yes, but it's free. Does it buffer every so often on 4m DSL?  Occasionally.  But it's free.  Is there a channel guide?  No. But it's free.  It's not supposed to replace your $60+ cable or satellite service.If this app won't run on your device, then yes, I don't blame anyone for giving it a bad review.  After all, you downloaded something that you can't use.  But it's a shame so many people are giving this app a bad review based on content selection or commercials or shows that run on certain stations. Again, this app is only supplying the feeds. It has ZERO control over what is or isn't being broadcast on each station.  Giving this app a bad review because you don't like the movies on HBO or the cartoons on Cartoon Network is kind of like punching your mailman because he delivered a bill.

Reviews.Title: Good app overall
Reviews.Author: J. Bruton "mrs beasley"
Reviews.Content: I've scanned the channel listing in this app and although there appear to be a lot of channels, many of them are second-rate cable access channels that are local to certain geographical areas and if you don't happen to live in those particular areas, the programming will mean nothing to you.  But on the flipside, there are quality channels like HBO, Starz, Animal Planet, Discovery and Lifetime, and the good news is that you don't have to pay for the premium channels like HBO and Starz.  I got the app only a couple days ago and I've already watched two HBO movies and a couple of TV shows on my Kindle Fire, just to really test the quality of the app.  I have to say -- so far, so good.  Even though there are a lot of channels in this app that I will probably never watch, the fact that the app is FREE and includes some channels that my cable company would charge me for, I can't complain.  The only reason I'm not giving this app five stars is because there's no program listing for the channels.  You can't click on a channel and see a list of what programs are showing and what times they're showing, so there's a very high probability that when you click on a channel, you'll be in the middle of a program and won't even know what the movie or program is.  Other than that, this app is good.  You can't go very wrong with FREE!

Reviews.Title: FREE TV/RADIO WORKS GREAT FOR THE KINDLE FIRE HD
Reviews.Author: DAVID R. MCFALL
Reviews.Content: I had my doubts at first, with the "US TV Free" app. To my delight, US TV Free is a terrific app. It is quick loading, and all the bells and whistles are neat, well placed and easy-to-use. That is just what I like in an app. Hulu + left me frustrated and after awhile I just gave in. I highly recommend "US TV Free" for most all age groups. Mom and Dad can control the settings. And keep in mind the COST OF THE APP IS PERFECT AS WELL. IT'S FREE!!

Reviews.Title: great the first day
Reviews.Author: G. Foster
Reviews.Content: when i went to log on to some of the channels they came up as offline, could not access them for last few days, have not tried again.  but overall for free it is a good app.

Reviews.Title: i give it 5

There are many listed that I have never gotten to load at all. Probably the best one of all I have tried.

Rarely can you watch  something without it needing to buffer multiple times.  But every once in a while the app seems to work just fine.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: BEST APP ON FIRE
Reviews.Author: V. Kehoe "Nonfiction is so real"
Reviews.Content: A year ago we cut the cord because of the ever increasing hikes.  But along comes this FREE app for my Fire.Wow once again I can watch NCIS on USA!The stations don't always come on but I have not found this to be a bother.  There are so many to choose from.Live news CNN Fox BBC etc etc.I went to the web site and they said there is no USTV PRO so don't be fooled.Thanks so much for an excellent productBTW if I were to have two more stations they would be HGTV and Weather channel.....hint hint.

Reviews.Title: Great app!

Reviews.Content: You can't complain, it is free :) Has a great selection of tv channels and when one gets cut off they usually fix it within a fair amount of time. I even got a mini HDMI to HDMI cord and can watch it on my tv. I don't have cable. I rely on Netflix, USTV and other free streaming sites to watch tv. This is a great app and I have recommended it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: asomeness

Reviews.Title: free tv

Reviews.Title: Actually Quite Amazing
Reviews.Author: maczib
Reviews.Content: Very cool, very free, works exactly as described! Thank you developers! Any complaints are from ppl w/probs having nothing to do with this app but obviously with their equip &/or settings not to mention their over entitled attitudes- seriously this is better than the $12/month at&t uverse app AND THIS ONES FREE! Worked great on my rzr connected to my home WiFi as well as LTE although prob wanna spare on data and use while connected to WiFi point being it works awesome people you get friggin free cable in palm if your hand! Less than a few years ago the ability to do that was a future fantasy that's now here- sure you may need to tweak s couple basic settings but before remote controls you had to get up to change the station on your TV also;) Great app very cool! Download it asap & enjoy! Thx again developers!

I can. watch hbo. 3 channels; bravo;tmc etc.

Reviews.Title: wow. one word for it.

Shanna Smith 

Angel eyes
Angel eyes

Reviews.Title: Santa

Reviews.Title: tv on my phone

Reviews.Title: Great app

Reviews.Title: good app
Reviews.Author: austin willhelm
Reviews.Content: I guess you get what you pay for this is a good app considering its free it could have more sports but none the less it's a good app for the price and I mean by and large the selection isn't bad

Reviews.Title: enjoy the freedom to watch and carry with us
Reviews.Author: Robin Machado
Reviews.Content: We have really liked the freedom to break away from the cable, dish, & we do not have over the air options. This allows for some good radio station plays as well a fair number of stations to be viewed.  Buffering can be an issue.

Reviews.Title: Best App I've ever paid for but need TV Guide
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: CON: Only issue is I don't know what I am watching or what is coming up on HBO & Showtime. Does anyone know what time zone or Country's listing I can pull up online to correspond ?PROS: Great picture, so many channels, local news in different cities, works on multiple devices. I have the app on my phone and my Android tablet and both connect to my big TV via HDMI cables. Haven't experienced any buffering, even when a channel says not available, wait a few mins and it usually works.I paid the small fee to purchase the app to avoid ads. For those worried about giving out credit card number (must buy thru the app and not the Play Store), Citibank has a program called Virtual Numbers which is wonderful. Set a limit and a expiration date for a one-time use virtual credit card.Again, if anyone knows where to get a TV guide for the HBO and Showtime being broadcasted, please reply.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Charlene Rossi
Reviews.Content: Wow, what a great app.  Can watch on my Kindle my favorite programs when I am on the go.  Thanks!!

Reviews.Title: Decent for what it is
Reviews.Author: InFiD3ViL
Reviews.Content: A pretty good app for watching TV. The picture quality is decent as well as audio. Channel selection is a bit sub-par, but there are some channels that I did not expect to see, which was a pleasant surprise.Overall I think the interface could be a  bit more modern took take better advantage of the screen space, but I am sure it will get more refined over time.To those that like playing with A/V gadgets, I think this is pretty good. 4/5

Reviews.Title: excellent software

Reviews.Content: I strongly recommend it to you for watching english channels. Please download it asap maybe later, it will be charged by the company, I guess.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad For Something Free
Reviews.Author: 5 of 7 "DSavage"
Reviews.Content: This would be a great app, if it was more dependable.  Sometimes the channel you want will not come in.  This may not be the app developer's fault, but it still renders the app as ok (3 stars).  Also, and more important to me, ABC News either does not play, plays with a black screen or it plays with a picture that has nothing to do with the audio that you hear.  I love Good Morning America and like to look at it on my Kindle Fire HD while at work, but I have not been able to enjoy it lately because of these issues.  You get frequent messages indicating that certain channels have been fixed, but if you choose one of those channels, it may or may not play.  I guess the best part is if you enjoy HBO, Showtime etc., those channels usually play well, which would be worth 4 or 5 stars for some.

Reviews.Title: Nice app but....
Reviews.Author: Megan R. Houser
Reviews.Content: I like the app but, I tried contacting them on their Facebook page and no response for days (though they managed to responded to others >:( ). I tried to get paid version and it opens my browser to my latest tabs I had open, but not to the pay site (no problem with my hubby getting there). Recently they updated so some channels I was having problems with are working now :). The premium channels; most are broadcast from foreign countries, language in english with foreign subs (no need for Xfinity, HBO Go and whatever apps require current cable or satellite subscriptions). Actually there are quite a few channels like this. Your paid upgrade is for one device only, it doesn't transfer to any other device you have this on. It's only $1.99 for upgrade and that's valid for 1 year (pretty damn good price even if it were to be paid monthly!). I've yet to see any "free Promo Codes" that they said they do infrequently. I wish they said what regions the channels came from so you could figure out when something would be on. Also whenever I leave the app on my tablet it erases all my favorites but on my phone it has no effect. You can add channels to streaming live feed or request channels (not sure how long it takes for them to get the channel if it's a possibility). They seem to fix problems in a timely manner. Overall this is a good product. I just wish customer service was better. When they straight out say you get the best customer service/high priority only if you're a paid customer, that's just plain wrong!
