Reviews.Content: Crashes constantly. Crashes when changing the station or when it cant find the stream. otherwise would be  a good app. loses favorites

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: yorkie500
Reviews.Content: it was goo when I first got it and then like all of the sudden all the channels that I want to watch say there is no Internet connection when I have wi-fi so I would and wouldn't recommend it.

Reviews.Title: good one to have
Reviews.Author: jag
Reviews.Content: A must to have is a really must works good on my phone an tablet both u will like it !!!!!

Reviews.Title: this app is great
Reviews.Author: Angelica Hutson
Reviews.Content: I can't believe how great this app is. You can watch anything like tv shows and movies. It's really great. I love it. My favorite is the CW channel. It has a lot of cool episodes. People should get this app more. I just love it.

Reviews.Title: very cool
Reviews.Author: Larry Ruth
Reviews.Content: Now i can watch T.V. in the bathroom on my Kindle rather play Angry Birds - how cool is that? Very. I don't know how they manage to do this for free but it is well worth the download if you like T.V.

Reviews.Title: Great app!
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Martin
Reviews.Content: Delivered the channels displayed. Fixes bugs. Channels are clear. Reminders pop up with free version to buy at the start of each channel. Decided to see what the upgrade would offer: Ability to record shows. I had to step away for about 15 min. and the program was recorded for me to watch. Cost: $1.99.ABC, NBC AND CBS were from PA, but knowing the time difference I was able to watch the network shows I wanted. Satisfied so far!

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: Tiggerray
Reviews.Content: this is the worst appm I have ever downloaded I would not send it to my dog, don't get it

Reviews.Title: USTV
Reviews.Author: Roxy Johnson
Reviews.Content: This App was just a tease. Most of the shows weren't available. The shows that were available were continually buffering, which can be frustrating when trying to watch a show. There were times when it would freeze or just completely shut off. I still can't understand why the History channel was in Spanish language only. I tried it for two weeks and suddenly it reset itself and removed the few channels that I initially got to just a few u-tube channels. This application sucks!

Reviews.Title: A HIT OR A MISS!!
Reviews.Author: cherry
Reviews.Content: This app needs to get its act together!  some of  the channels you were watching previously will not stream the next.  lots of choices though if they work!

Reviews.Title: Good App needs some help
Reviews.Author: M Lee
Reviews.Content: I love this app just can't get a constant stream.  Some channels just sent in the correct language.  Afraid to spend the $2.00 on the upgrade, just for the simple fact there is not much more offered with the upgrade.  Can they promise a constant stream?

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: pleasant surprise!  very happy to find this application.  keep up the good work.  looking forward to using this app often.  great variety!

Reviews.Title: It's better now than when I first got it...
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Initially, this app was merely 40/60 useful.  The update improved it, although several of the channels it presents do not seem to be available at times.  Is this a problem, not really considering that I am looking or Fox News, or live network TV that is generally accessible.  When the kids are watching cartoons on our TV, this apps provides me another option to watch something more substantial.

Reviews.Title: too long
Reviews.Author: Lola Tucker
Reviews.Content: Never loads .why have it.takes way to much time. What is the point. My time is valuable.don't care for it

Reviews.Title: Good tv app, at least i thought
Reviews.Author: Newbee
Reviews.Content: Worth the cost ! Picture was a little fuzzy but they have more channels than my cable provider.  No tv and computer just crashed so at least I can watch bravo and other channels here.  I wrote this review shortly after I downloaded it and now my opinion has changed.  60% of the time you can't get the channel you want.  Once you do get a channel than the"buy the upgrade box" comes up and when you clear that off the screen, sometimes you lose the connection and have to start over.  I was trying to watch USA and it was the disney channel.  I paid 1.99 for the upgrade and still that darn stupid box comes up.  all i can say is, its free, try it for yourself:(

Reviews.Title: free tv flubbo
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: What a waste of time. I couldn't have cozen a worse app if I tried. It didn't work half the time and when it did it was worthless.

Reviews.Title: The jury is still out
Reviews.Author: Margaret Baker
Reviews.Content: I have only had this app for 2 days.  So far, I have only been able to get BBC News, which is something I like, but I would really like to have more programs available.  I live in Panama so it is always good to try American TV links.  I will keep trying.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Sandra Dunn
Reviews.Content: Just started watching this app... Not bad.. I like that I can watch some of the march madness basketball games on try tv

Reviews.Title: good app in general
Reviews.Author: mundis
Reviews.Content: i really like this app simple and to the point only wish there were a way to customize channel lists

Reviews.Title: tv app
Reviews.Author: Kendo
Reviews.Content: it glitches out sometimes but overall I was satisfied with it. the channel options are pretty vast when its working well.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Elvia
Reviews.Content: Couldn't get much use from this.  Either the channel came in Spanish or wouldn't pick up at all.  BBC news was the only thing I was able to view.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author:
Alexandra
Alexandra
Reviews.Content: They is a lot of great channels including animal planet, syfy, and all the great kids channels like Disney channel and Nickelodeon. You need internet connection to watch and some of the shows are a little fuzzy but other than that this app is amazing. If you can't afford cable this app is a life saver.

Reviews.Title: Just ok.
Reviews.Author: melissa richardson
Reviews.Content: This is just ok. May even delete it. Supposed to be US tv but get most channels in other languages. Picture is blurry and lots of times they don't even load. Not recommended. May be useful if cant possibly get anything to stream...

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Dilly
Reviews.Content: I was surprised that I it really does offer some stations that I really do like. Some stations are a little choppy, but overall not bad.

Reviews.Title: Free TV
Reviews.Author: Sally Dinovo "TV & Movie Junkie"
Reviews.Content: So far I'm able to get programs that I couldn't otherwise see because I don't have cable. Haven't used it to full capacity yet.

Reviews.Title: Pretty darn good!!
Reviews.Author: Savvy Shopper
Reviews.Content: I am super impressed with the channel selection. Ocassionally I will need to choose a different source than the first one I selected, but I absolutely love that I can watch real live shows from such a wide variety of channels.  I am disappointed that I can't access it on my iPad. It says it is only for US citizens viewing OUTSIDE of the US. Bummer! Since it is so small, it is hard to read scores during a basketball game, but I highly recommend this app.

Reviews.Title: channel offline
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: it ok but not all channels are online there are no bet this minute you watch a channel when you get back at it it is off. line

Reviews.Title: great app
Reviews.Author: nathanphall "nathan p hall"
Reviews.Content: The app instaled easy with no problems and works well on the system. It is a great app especially for free and offers lots of channels and variety. The only problem I have had is not all of the channels work and sometimes it freezes. Overall though it is a great app.

Reviews.Title: loveeee
Reviews.Author: ashleyann
Reviews.Content: This app is awesome ! I don't regret downloading it one bit .. Now I have everything needed in my kindle it is now like my bible I don't leave home without it , lol...

Reviews.Title: Great App.
Reviews.Author: Phil Lagana
Reviews.Content: Used it on my Kindle Fire.  I works very well.  Watched the Syracuse Big East Tournament game.  A little grainy but I didn't expect HD quality.

Reviews.Title: Great app!
Reviews.Author: BuckeyeBoy
Reviews.Content: Surpassed my expectations and is easy to use on my Nexus10. There are a few channels that I could not receive but that is to be expected. A great price .......... Free!

Reviews.Title: Was not sure about this.
Reviews.Author: Linda Parker
Reviews.Content: I downloaded the application but I was unsure about it. So I installed this and tested it out. Normally I wait until all of the apps that I want are installed but I just had to see. I was surprised. It works great. Not only do you have these awesome channels to choose from, but sources as well. I would recommend this to most everyone.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: david ochoa "dude"
Reviews.Content: It's good but there is buffering, it might just be my connection though and they have good channels that are on cable

Reviews.Title: T.v without cost or cable!
Reviews.Author: Trudy
Reviews.Content: no cable and I'm watching shows i never get on t.v. excellant app.ease of use is fine and there constantly want input from their customers as to which channels to have. depending how fast your buffers load., there shouldn't  be any prpblems. Thumbs UP,! this one is a keeper. if u don't  want the ads then spend the couple of bucks. you won't  be sorry.verry nice app guys.good work.

Reviews.Title: What a fantastic find!
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: This is awesome!! The first night I had it I watched a movie on my Kindle Fire! The sound was amazing! What fun!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome App!
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: If you don't have cable but still want to watch a lot of the channels for free... this is for you.

Reviews.Title: wonderful ,
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "love photos"
Reviews.Content: I get so many channels I don't know where to start .its a great app.i can sit and watch tv stations all day

Reviews.Title: PORTABLE TV EVERYWHERE
Reviews.Author: Seven Is It
Reviews.Content: This is a great little app.  As with a lot of apps it uses battery power quickly but it works great.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: padilla
Reviews.Content: This app works really fine.  An excelent app. It is worth to have it. Works fine on mi kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Not with Kindle
Reviews.Author: Glenda L. Pounds
Reviews.Content: Doesn't work with Kindle Fire. It may work with the new Kindle Fire HD though. Seems like it might be a good app.

Reviews.Title: Too many "not available now, try later" and local government channels
Reviews.Author: JH Meyer
Reviews.Content: If you live in Florida and want to tune into local government channels in Washington state, this site is for you.  It's great fun to watch cartoons like "Tom and Jerry" for my kids, but I guess you get what you pay for:  "FREE,"  JHM

Reviews.Title: Great app
Reviews.Author: Ruth G
Reviews.Content: Was so excited to see that this actually works.  Picture is a bit grainy, but it's ok with me.  Lots of channels to chose from and works great with my kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: I love this app!!
Reviews.Author: Cedric
Reviews.Content: I can watch just about any cable channel basic or premium for free. Unlimited television for free!! Definitely can't beat that. I  highly recommend this app.

Reviews.Title: free but not always available
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: The app is not bad but a lot of the time you can't get anything and other times it's not in you time zone or it's not in English. Example: Disney XD is always in Spanish and some shows are in English but have subtitles. BUT,  it's better than no Tv at all.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Jerm
Reviews.Content: I have dish network so when I got watch ESPN app I couldn't do anything with it but you don't need any of those apps anymore because you can get this you can just watch any channel you want for FREE!!!!! You gotta get this app!

Reviews.Title: free is free best app I have downloaded free or not...free tv Love it
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: Outstanding....some annoying pop ups, but it is the best tv tuner and it was and is free see yahoo cable

Reviews.Title: not bad at all
Reviews.Author: Kmo
Reviews.Content: for what it is this is great...not perfect in overall pic quality but streams well and I am able to watch easily on the Kindle. Will def consider buying paid version

Reviews.Title: ustv
Reviews.Author: olivia
Reviews.Content: When I first loaded this app,  it was pretty cool.after I installed it in our second kindle fire...the sound was great but never a picture...always 'connecting'  but never catching.

Reviews.Title: great app for tv on the go
Reviews.Author: johnphaga
Reviews.Content: Great Tv app for Tv on the goA must get app I get more channels on this app than I do from my own carrier

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: BobG
Reviews.Content: Awesome for watching on your phone/tabley or computer when your not around any TV's. Great product works great where I live looking forward to trying it up in the woods camping where tower signal isn't great.

Reviews.Title: It's  okay  but not great
Reviews.Author: T. Sacco "DagoT"
Reviews.Content: I have never been able to keep a connection to a show for its entirety.  When I log off I lose all saved channels. But it IS free so ...

Reviews.Title: Great app
Reviews.Author: Darrell
Reviews.Content: I think this app has everything I need as if I was sitting in my own living room watching tv. I recommend everyone gives the app a try for starters & I'm sure they will enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: hit and miss
Reviews.Author: Hank Lopez
Reviews.Content: When it works its ok, but tut out can never depend on it working from not time to the next.  Doesn't tell how much upgrade costs

Reviews.Title: Awesome App
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Awesome AppWorks very well on my Samsung Galaxy NexusWorks Just like it should a and just like Advertised..

Reviews.Title: handy when away from home
Reviews.Author: kathy
Reviews.Content: like most reviewers I feel that this is a good app.  I would like it better if you could have some kind of guide.  this would save time.

Reviews.Title: A Nice Surprise
Reviews.Author: K. Ruth "kreative1"
Reviews.Content: I have tried a number of TV apps and downloads over the years. This is by far the best!I can watch many of my favorite shows without having to wait until they are available online.I am very happy with this and hope to get the pro version soon.

Reviews.Title: Great app
Reviews.Author: tlunceford
Reviews.Content: works really well ..a lot of channels to choose from. It offers a wide variety of topics from movies,  childrens programs,  news,  sports. a great app!!

Reviews.Title: worth getting
Reviews.Author: Stmb 04
Reviews.Content: You can watch slot of your favorite channels. Although the system is always buffering, it's free and fun. Has an upgrade, maybe that would help with buffering.

Reviews.Title: 3 stars
Reviews.Author: Alu1026
Reviews.Content: This is a great app for it to be free. It has something for everyone. However, it is constantly buffering on my kindle fire hd. It plays just a few seconds then buffers. This is really annoying when I am watching a great show. But overall it is a good app and I give it 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: US TV
Reviews.Author: Deacon
Reviews.Content: It hangs some times and doesn't have much of a variety, but that's to be expected when it is free.

Reviews.Title: This app
Reviews.Author: J. McIntosh
Reviews.Content: This app works and that in its self is fine, but when you log on to any of the stations you have no idea what is playing, unless you look up that stations guide and then log on to that station, and I am not sure about the collection of data, good ide, but not very practical

Reviews.Title: Thus far
Reviews.Author: Fallen1
Reviews.Content: Thus far I have gone through most of the channels and there are some awesome choices. great free app. only add is a tiny one in lower corner. some lag issues on a few channels but all and all it is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: bird lover
Reviews.Content: It's free and it works most the time..try it and I don't  think you will be disappointed.  I have recommended this app to many friends

Reviews.Title: Nice to be able to check TV while I am not at home.
Reviews.Author: hms5375
Reviews.Content: Not all channels are available, or even available for long, but it is nice to not miss stuff when I am not at home to watch.  I don't have cable/satellite or a DVR at home, so I only watch network TV when the shows air and this allows me to see what is on or catch some parts of shows that I would otherwise miss.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Albert Alvidrez
Reviews.Content: it was a great price. its a good product. i had fast service. i would recommend this item to others

Reviews.Title: ustv
Reviews.Author: helen runser
Reviews.Content: i love it. works great and i get all my fav channels and my kids fav channels. i would recomend it

Reviews.Title: It doesn't get any better than this
Reviews.Author: Vanessa
Reviews.Content: Amazing app to watch premium channels, great picture quality, great sound, can't believe this is free. Get this now! You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: adam d
Reviews.Author: Adam B. Denberg
Reviews.Content: some of the channels stream well, but others constantly freeze and render the app useless. better streaming capabilities is a must by the creator in order for me to continue use of the app.

Reviews.Title: Surprised
Reviews.Author: Gordon L. Young
Reviews.Content: i found this app to be far better than my expectations.  it  provides lots of channels  with very reasonable quality. Well done!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: ':P
Reviews.Content: great!  this app has all the chanles and is awsome! its the first app to do this and theres no sign in on your tv company!!!! I LOVE THIS APP!!

Reviews.Title: Good App
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The stations that work are good.  I enjoy Fox News.  Some of the stations don't work.  The reminder to upgrade is irritating.

Reviews.Title: Nice app...lots of good channels
Reviews.Author: BERT HAYS
Reviews.Content: I really like this app.  It's a nice alternative to netflix or hulu.  It has live TV with many of the same channels you would get on premium cable like HBO and Showtime.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: corrupted visuals
Reviews.Content: This app may be the best free Tv app. It lets you watch live tv including cable channels like Showtime, H.B.O and Fox movies just to list a few for free. However other reviews mention that some channels do not work. This is true but I'm the ones that don't work are usually fixed within 2-3 days. Overall great app.

Reviews.Title: Best Tv App Ever
Reviews.Author: Taz
Reviews.Content: I downloaded this app on all my devices after trying it. Yes some of the streams are not available, but there are plenty of other streams that work. My kid's absolutely love it, they can watch all their favorite channels.

Reviews.Title: TV app for Kindle
Reviews.Author: Love Europe
Reviews.Content: I tried this app, thinking it might be okay, but many channels I chose weren't online.  When I did choose a channel, most of the time it spent time loading, so I couldn't really watch the show.  Thanks anyway, I tried it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: jski
Reviews.Content: If you have a quick wifi then this is for you. I could not believe that I can watch Tv on my Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Title: Works but......
Reviews.Author: S-Dog62
Reviews.Content: This app does work as advertised and being able to watch cable channels on a tablet or phone is pretty cool. My only complaint is the video quality sucks, it a blockhead, 320x240 resolution. You get pop-ups asking youto buy the "Pro" version, so maybe the picture quality is better in it.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I love it that this app has a variety of tv stations and cable networks available but the downside is many of them are offline at any given time.I just wished all the stations worked more often and if they did it would be a great app.

Reviews.Title: One of my all-time favorite apps!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Moved about a year ago and lost some of my favorite channels. Discovered this app a few months ago and was pleasantly surprised to find my long lost channels! Having messed around with some other tv apps, I was waiting to see what surprises this one had in store for me. Again, pleasantly surprised to find none! Works great! The only problem now is that it keeps me up too late. But that's my problem.CHEERS!And a big Thank You to everyone behind US TV!

Reviews.Title: I do love it.
Reviews.Author: Zandra
Reviews.Content: Very neat to be able to get cable stations that are not in my cable package. It is an excellent app.

Reviews.Title: So-so. Unreliable ablity to load popular channels.
Reviews.Author: Devlin
Reviews.Content: It's okay enough to keep it on my tablet but not as good as hoped. Channels are often unavailable, buffering can make you nuts some times. The days it's going well it's nice to use when I am on my work break.

Reviews.Title: Installed and worked flawlessly.
Reviews.Author: Steve Barrow
Reviews.Content: I have tried a number of "free" on-line tv programs. Most were very bad and some mediocre. I should give this one 5 stars but I did not because the programming on most channels is old or "yesterdays". Since there are fees the networks demand to air current or live feeds, this is program has a large selection of "channels". Other programs do also but with US TV Free there were no dead channels. Bare in mind some "channels" are not on 24 hours.I do not know why the title is US TV because there are other countries channels available. A very good mix of programming to suit everyone's tastes.

Reviews.Title: poor streaming
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: poor streaming once the show gets to the middle, some time it freezes but sound continues. had high hopes for this

Reviews.Title: Great when it works!
Reviews.Author: Dianna L. Rion
Reviews.Content: This is the best tv app that I`'ve tried so far.  It freezes up occasionally, but all in all a good investment (free),.  However, my spyware app wants me to get rid of it, so be your own judge.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: DARVE C ANDERSON
Reviews.Content: Great app, about time there is an app that can stream broadcast channels. Now if there was an easy way to cache or at least see a schedule this would be a given star.

Reviews.Title: Nice Surprise
Reviews.Author: Vickie N
Reviews.Content: Was surprised this actually worked so well.  Really enjoying. Wish the streaming was a bit better but that may be our server.

Reviews.Title: Amazon's "US TV Free"
Reviews.Author: Dwranny "Dwranny"
Reviews.Content: This ad, I believe, is showing pre-recorded TV/Radio shows. I ran it against my satellite service and the shows were not listed on my service as showing at the time; but came through mostly clearly both visibly and audibly. The selection is large and "best" or "favorite" channels can be selected. I LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Love, love love this app
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this app, it works  great !! I could not believe that it is free, I hope they have more app

Reviews.Title: US TV Free
Reviews.Author: James Becraft
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical of this product before down loading... but the thing really works great!! So far besides really needing a 4g network to use this efficiently, i've only had one station that really had a time delay from the picture to voice and that was the Disney channel. I also wish their was a purchase upgrade threw Amazon or Paypal. Not really sure about purchasing threw British funding pages..

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Kathy Grant
Reviews.Content: This app would be so much better if ALL of the channels worked..some of the channels are out of sync or time lapsed..but for a free app its not bad..if they tweek this app a little more so that you can view the different channels that they promote then this app would be GREAT!

Reviews.Title: US TV Free
Reviews.Author: Peggy Stanley
Reviews.Content: Thought I could watch TV on this, but it is too grainy and you can't choose what you want to watch!!

Reviews.Title: kind of
Reviews.Author: I love this game !!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Content: What I like about it is they have Tom and Jerry what I don't like about it is  Disney channel is in Spanish

Reviews.Title: Not dependable
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: I am glad that I didn't buy this because the majority of the channels are said to be "off line". Some days channels are there,the next they are not. I do like the choices of channels, there is also my local cable access channels.... I just wish this app could be more dependable.

Reviews.Title: killer
Reviews.Author: d.mckinney
Reviews.Content: I have nothing bad to say. For the $1.99 it's a win win for me. Slow speed internet makes it a drag, but I can get use to that. As soon as the record function is added its six stars for me. Glad I got it!

Reviews.Title: pigs lol
Reviews.Author: it stinks
Reviews.Content: sometimes dosent work but I love it still it has disney and disney XD I think it will be seem for you

Reviews.Title: Live news? You bet!
Reviews.Author: S. Wakefield "MdniteCruiser"
Reviews.Content: I'm very impressed with USTV & USTV Pro. I really needed to be able to watch the news live, in rooms which generally don't have TV.  The garage, the tool shed, and ,yes, even the WC are places I spend time, and would like to keep up with the world on live TV.  This little app keeps me informed 24/7. I probably use USTv more than any other app on my little tablet .Thanks!!!

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: r rosenthal
Reviews.Content: amazing I love it for all the channels I watch are on this app. perfect for whenever I am on the go and I am usually a bated when it comes to these kinds of apps

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Charlene Chappell
Reviews.Content: lots of waiting on pages to load and lots of Russian. or Portuguese. dubbing but cool enough that it works at all

Reviews.Title: goodish
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Its awesome but it lags amd there horrable graphics.Besides that it is good and I would deffanly use it on the go

Reviews.Title: Really did not care for it.
Reviews.Author: LouisianaGirl
Reviews.Content: I really did not like it.  I could not get it to work well. I really do not think I will use it.

Reviews.Title: Suprised
Reviews.Author: Tabitha Bailey
Reviews.Content: I downloaded this thinking it wouldn't work, because most free apps like this aren't very good. To my surprise it turned out to be a great app. Some links don't work and it does buffer some but its free. This app works well on my Kindle Fire HD. No complaints from me !!! :) Plus you get to watch channels that usually require a paid subscription.

Reviews.Title: great free tv
Reviews.Author: love it
Reviews.Content: When nothing on tv(cable gos out)i can count on this to keep or finish watching my programs.Just wish FX was a channel to choose.Sons of anarchy is coming.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Miller
Reviews.Content: This app works and has a lot of channels. It's the app we all look for. I'm gonna upgrade to the pro version.

Reviews.Title: I love this thing
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Finally ..a TV app that does what I was looking for .. lets me watch TV. This app is wonderful and works like a charm. It's easy to use and doesn't force me to use a social media site. I wish all apps were this complete and simple for the simple minded like me. I will try to find more from this developer. Thanks for making something that actually works.

Reviews.Title: NOT TO GOOD
Reviews.Author: Jeff Hall
Reviews.Content: The app is not able to keep up the streaming speed.  The video is great but locks up about every couple of minutes. Very irritating. This is something that needs fixing, the buffering needs increasing to at least 30seconds.  Are the developers planning any updates in the immediate future?

Reviews.Title: good tv app
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: I'm giving it 4 stars because there's no way to change the video quality other then that it works great on my kindle fire hd since I watch tru tv on It I'm going to watch the new lizard lick towing on it to really put it to test other then that I would recommend this app for people that don't want to get up and change channels

Reviews.Title: the only few chanels that matter
Reviews.Author: valerie a rodriguez
Reviews.Content: It only has a few worth while chanels like hbo cinamax and showtime but its worth it since its free all the other chanels are weird

Reviews.Title: App does what it promises
Reviews.Author: Sheilla C.
Reviews.Content: So far I really like this app. I have only had an opportunity to view one station so far because I just downloaded it but the picture was clear as well well as the audio

Reviews.Title: works sometimes
Reviews.Author: cootnbear
Reviews.Content: When this works it is great. It has alot of stations that one day they will come in the next day they won't. When it does work I am very pleased with the station.

Reviews.Title: Awesome because it's FREE!
Reviews.Author: mommybooklover
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying I just don't get the people complaining about this app when it's free. I think if I had paid for it I might have knocked one star off my review. The app is not perfect and there are some channels that don't work. However for me it has been great. We got rid of cable a few years ago and just went with Netflix streaming and also Amazon Instant Video. Between those two there are tons and tons of shows and movies to watch. However my kids do still miss getting to watch things like Disney Channel. Well with this App they are able to watch it and again it's free.So far we've watched Disney,HBO,USA,A&E;, and what seems to be an all Tom & Jerry all the time channel. These channels have all come in awesome for us. There are many channels that just don't work but I really don't care because I didn't even have to pay for this. If they do work at some point that's great, if not oh well.Another thing to mention is there are quite a few of the channels that are in Spanish which was a bummer for us. There are two Nickelodeon channels but both are in Spanish. However this could obviously be a great thing for others so I'm not knocking it for that reason. It would be great if they could include an English Nickelodeon channel.So I say all in all you can not go wrong with this app unless you are a very picky person that expects the world for nothing. We've used this on our first gen Kindle Fire and it's been great for our whole family. Go into this with fair expectations and I think you'll be pleased. And really if you don't like it you can delete it and you aren't out anything anyway.

Reviews.Title: Maybe You'll Be Lucky
Reviews.Author: Fred in SC
Reviews.Content: Hard to imagine how anybody could rave about this app. (Is the viewer's location critical?) At any given time, only a small percentage of channels work. Among those that do, some are oddities-- like an English language movie with foreign subtitles, or a foreign language movie without subtitles. Many working channels will frequently freeze and re-buffer. If you're lucky, a couple of your favorite channels (most likely, news channels), will work most of the time. On the one hand, how bad could it be-- given that it's free, or $1.99 max. On the other hand, it's annoying to never be sure that your favorite channel will be working when you want it. This app would be pointless on Kindle Fire, if KF had Adobe Flash and could get TV channels the normal way.

Reviews.Title: ok

Reviews.Title: tv for free

Reviews.Title: shows are not always there .

Reviews.Content: When you are ready to watch something it is not always there. Also the app doesn't always open.  I keep trying to work with it but it doesn't cooperate all the time.

Reviews.Title: almost ok
Reviews.Author: yes sir
Reviews.Content: way too much buffering. channel availability is also an issue. when a channel becomes available the next day,  its gone. for me I can't get any of the major networks.

Reviews.Title: This app is freakin' awesome!

Reviews.Author: Rakeem
Reviews.Content: I downloaded this app believing it was gonna just be an ordinary channel apply that only shows me Indian movies .. I was wrong this app is awesome! and it actually has a channel for tom and Jerry. it has HBO evn cinemax! and its free!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful app. A Traveler's must-have!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Bray
Reviews.Content: I was apprehensive about trying this app, as I've tried others like it that promised much but offered little. This little gem, however, delivered far more than I expected!  All the channels I would regularly watch on my Dish Network subscription at home are there, not to mention the ability to watch premium movie channels such as HBO as well. US TV FREE worked flawlessly in my hotel room, as I pulled up channel after channel of the well-known networks such as Discovery Channel, SyFy, etc. The resolution was great, although I'm sure it would decrease with lower available bandwidth. Try out the free version first, which works well, but you cannot save settings or favorites.I expect you will enjoy this app as much as I do.

Reviews.Title: Limited functionality, very buggy on the Fire 8.9 HD
Reviews.Author: Comdet
Reviews.Content: This is a somewhat useful app that is marred by a lot of functionality bugs on the Fire 8.9. Very few channels will play - I've only been able to get MSNBC and Sky to work. All the other channels I've tried just generate an error.The video quality ranges from fair to pretty good. The video occupies a small window - it cannot be expanded to take advantage of the full screen size.There's no ability to sort, search or manage stations (or, if there is, it is non-functional on the Fire 8.9). But, with only two functioning channels, that's really not much of a problem.Since it's free it's worth a download on the Fire if you want to watch msnbc or Sky. Otherwise, not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Iffy
Reviews.Author: tikisailor on utoob "Tiki"
Reviews.Content: Sometimes a station works, sometimes it doesn't. I've watched a few programs on it, but I won't be buying the pro version.

Reviews.Title: Very good

But there are many, many channels that are or seem to be, from out-of-the-way cities around the country (tee-hee). There are two major cable networks, make that three if you can get the feed. I'm tempted to upgrade, but, the signal comes and goes, its really, in the free version anyway, kind of amateurish, still, its good for a chuckle.

Had to remove back and pull the simm and sd card 2 force a shutdown of my phone since the battery can't be removed. UNINSTALLED IMMEDIATELY!! Absolutely terrible app...there are much better ones for TV viewing, don't waste time on this one.

Reviews.Title: Nice app... when it works!
Reviews.Author: D. Roberts
Reviews.Content: After using this app for over two months now, it has potential and works well when it wants to work.  I'm using it on a Kindle Fire (which some claim does not work on it, but I am living proof that it does) which I am happy to say since several have claimed otherwise.  Many channels are listed (several in different countries outside the U.S.), but do not work, while many others do.  It can be buggy at times and either freeze up on ya or buffers a lot, but it manages to pull through most of the time.  In short, this app has potential and the makers of it are constantly at work to fix broken channels with occasional announcements of fixed and newly added channels.  Some people have even reported that they have requested new channels to be added to the list and their requests have been granted rather quickly.  I have yet to try this.  My suggestion is to try this app before you buy it and give it at least a month's time to decide on whether you like it or not.  You may be pleasantly surprised by this app.  ;)  Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Buggy in Landscape Mode.  Not worth paying for the pro version.
Reviews.Author: Gary W. Cook
Reviews.Content: Enjoy the free version.  You get what you pay for with it.  Many channels you want to watch won't be available and that doesn't improve if you upgrade.  They also charge you for each device you own.  I upgraded on my ASUS tablet because the payment app locked up my Motorola droid.  But I wanted it for the droid.  Here's the really bad part.  You can only access the menus such as preview, add channel, favorites, and more when in Portrait Mode!  That's screwed because the the ASUS has a keyboad attached and doesn't rotate the screen.  Sloppy application.  I also have a Woxter Android TV box that connects to the TV.  This is a perfect app for it but I can't get to the menus.  All I can do is just change the channel.Update:Not even a great value for free unless your time has no value.  Many channels are always unavailable.  Support requests for the pro version I paid for go unanswered.  Updates don't work.

Reviews.Title: USTV WORKS BETTER THAN EXPECTED!!!!!  BY FAR! !
Reviews.Author: ELANA WILLIAMS
Reviews.Content: I was sceptical for any Tv shown on my kindle fire...so I tried it first on my samsung Admire....it did a lot of buffering....but finally. a few stations started to work ...then I was able to  watch "the Huntsman" in its entirely !!!!!!!! WOW.....SO THEN I GOT IT ON MY KINDLE ....MORE BUFFERING...BUT OK....CAN ANYBODY TELL ME HOE MUCH FOR THE THE UPGRADE? ??? NO WHERE IS IT WRITTEN...THEY JUST ASK FOR YOUR CREDIT CARD....MMMMMMM THAT MAKES ME LEARY....BUT STILL ITS AWESOME. FOR FREE! !!!!! REALLY...GET IT! !!!!!
